orig_text:
N = L / (W-P * stripe_unit)
L' = N * (W * stripe_unit) +
    (L % (W-P * stripe_unit))
correct_text:
N = L / ((W-P) * stripe_unit)
L' = N * (W * stripe_unit) +
    (L % ((W-P) * stripe_unit))
notes: Missing parenthesis around lower precedence expression
Missing parenthesis around lower precedence expression

orig_text:
The equations given above for embedded parity can be used to
map a file offset to the correct component object by setting the
number of parity components to 2 instead of 1 for RAID4 or RAID5.
correct_text:
The equations given above for embedded parity can be used to
map a file offset to the correct component object by setting the
number of parity components to 2 instead of 1 for RAID5.
notes: Clarify that the RAID_PQ algorithm extends the rotated parity scheme as specified for RAID_5.
